name: DL_V4
description:
a game about autistic boy ruining trash pizza man's day.

featuring bootleg vinny lore known as "nivvy", his (not so) precious day gets ruined by an humanoid alien called wacky. wacky get what they deserve, while the trash pizza man get some nice things. a nonsense shitpost.

controls:

arrow keys to move

Z or Enter: select, call menu

X: cancel
